Problem: Friday Bottleneck. Solution: Aggressive Yield Management.

Ops Manual: The Airline Yield Model

How to trick Wix Bookings into acting like an Airline Revenue Management System.

1

Split the Inventory

Don't just have "60 Minute Flight". Create two hidden duplicate services:
Flight - Weekday and Flight - Weekend.

2

The "Staff Hack"

Wix links services to "Staff". Create a "Weekday Instructor" and a "Weekend Instructor".
Set "Weekend Instructor" availability to Fri-Sat ONLY. Assign the expensive service to him. Now, the cheap rate physically cannot be booked on Friday.

3

Visual Blocking

On the frontend, use a "Category" tab logic. "Weekend Flights" tab shows the premium prices. "Midweek Deals" tab shows the standard prices.
